SA23n2988:10: ye na jānanti muḍhāste bhramantīha bhavārṇave || 3 ||
SA23n2988:13: te spṛśanti parāṁ bodhiṁ janmanīhaiva sādhakāḥ || 4 ||
SA23n2988:18: rūpayauvanasampatterbhogaiśvaryabalasya ca janmagotrapravṛttasya na citte mānamudvahet || 6 ||
SA23n2988:45: pacyante narake ghore tena yogī vimucyate || 15 ||
SA23n2988:60: ahaṁ mama vikalpaṁ ca na kuryād yogatattvavit || 20 ||
SA23n2988:71: gururbuddho bhaved dharmaḥ saṅghaścāpi sa eva hi |
SA23n2988:72: prasādād jñāyate tasya yasya ratnatrayaṁ varam || 24 ||
SA23n2988:81: ityuvāca jagannātho nānye vai guravaḥ smṛtāḥ || 27 ||
SA23n2988:86: tatsamo vidyate loke mānyo na tribhave janaḥ |
SA23n2988:102: arthanāśo bhavet tasya maraṇaṁ śīghrameva ca || 34 ||
SA23n2988:105: anubhūya ya dottiṣṭhet cāṇḍāle hīnaje kule || 35 ||
SA23n2988:107: (4) utpadyate sa mūḍhātmā muko vā vikalo'thavā ||
SA23n2988:108: jātyandho hi bhaved jāto jātau jātau ma saṁśayaḥ || 36 ||
SA23n2988:126: te'pi tasya na kurvanti vighnaṁ bhītāḥ prayānti ca || 42 ||
SA23n2988:137: (5) dahyate nāgniskandhena plāvyate na jalena ca |
SA23n2988:158: kleśajñeyāvṛtaṁ sarvaṁ yadā muktaṁ bhavet tadā |
SA23n2988:165: nirmitatvāt ca buddhānāṁ kāyo nairmāṇiko mataḥ || 55 ||
SA23n2988:173: garbhacakraṁ mānayet ca kṣetre kṣetre pratikṣaṇam |
SA23n2988:204: anyad vāpi ca yat kiñcit tathaiva vidhimācaret || 68 ||
SA23n2988:212: vratī vā muṇḍito vā'tha gṛhī vā sevako'tha vā |
SA23n2988:213: rājā vā sevakādhyakṣo yathā'sau rocayed vratī || 71 ||
SA23n2988:215: tathāsau kurute yogī sarvathā na praduṣyati |
SA23n2988:224: nātra vighnā na mārāśca sarve vaśyā bhavanti ca |
SA23n2988:249: yathā cittaṁ na praduṣyeta tathā kāryaṁ suśobhanam || 83 ||
SA23n2988:265: durlabhaṁ sugatau janma vajrasattvaṁ kathaṁ bhavet || 88 ||
SA23n2988:271: yuktyāgamavicāraistu grahītuṁ ye tu na kṣamāḥ || 90 ||
SA23n2988:293: evaṁ cet prāṇinaḥ sarve sambuddhāstribhave sadā |
SA23n2988:300: kathaṁ te na pravarttante buddhakāyo bhaved yadi || 4 ||
SA23n2988:302: yastvevaṁ na prajānāti sa sambuddho bhavet katham |
SA23n2988:303: evaṁ jānāti cet kaścidasau buddho bhaviṣyati || 5 ||
SA23n2988:308: svabhāvād yadi te buddhā nābhyāsena prayojanam |
SA23n2988:314: mithyākalpanayā yasmād rājyaṁ tasya na vidyate |
SA23n2988:321: strīndriyaṁ ca yathā padmaṁ vajraṁ puṁsendriyaṁ tathā || 11 ||
SA23n2988:323: svabhāvād devatākāyaṁ tasmād vaktuṁ na yujyate |
SA23n2988:327: saṁskṛto jāyate tasmāt naśyate tu ghaṭādivat || 13 ||
SA23n2988:330: bhāvanā'pi kimarthaṁ syād yadi bhūtvā vinaśyati || 14 ||
SA23n2988:336: manasā kalpitaṁ yat tadavināśi kathaṁ bhavet || 16 ||
SA23n2988:341: akṛtaṁ devatārūpaṁ bhāvyate tat tvayā yadi |
SA23n2988:344: bhaveyaṁ tādṛśaṁ rūpaṁ matvā hamiti bhāvanā |
SA23n2988:348: yadā dhyānaṁ sphuṭībhūtaṁ dṛśyate devatā tu sā || 20 ||
SA23n2988:353: ajātaṁ devatārūpaṁ dhyāne tatra gataṁ yadi |
SA23n2988:356: evaṁ cet nāsti te samyak tad dhyānenāgataṁ bhavet |
SA23n2988:357: tvayā niṣpāditaṁ rūpaṁ kṛtakaṁ kiṁ na budhyase || 23 ||
SA23n2988:359: ahaṁ taditi pakṣe tu dvayaṁ tatra na vidyate |
SA23n2988:362: sarvajñatvaṁ hi sarvajño na bhūyaḥ prāptumicchati |
SA23n2988:365: evaṁ te nāsti samyaktvaṁ kathaṁ mithyā prakalpyate |
SA23n2988:374: tasmāt tvarūpavāna buddhaḥ kvacit loke pravarttate |
SA23n2988:377: (13) na rūpiṇo yathā buddhā yuktyā yastvajaḍātmakaḥ |
SA23n2988:378: pradeśastho bhaved rūpī ṣaḍabhijñaḥ kathaṁ bhavet || 30 ||
SA23n2988:386: gatvā cet tat prajñānāti kramād jñātuṁ kathaṁ kṣamaḥ |
SA23n2988:392: pratimeva tu niśceṣṭo buddhakāyo hi labhyate |
SA23n2988:398: yadi jñānena jānīyād buddhakāyena kiṁ tadā |
SA23n2988:399: kāyasthaṁ vetti tad jñānamataḥ kāyo hi sarvavit || 37 ||
SA23n2988:402: kāyena saha saṁyuktaṁ nirvāṇe naśyate [hi] tat || 38 ||
SA23n2988:407: (14) kāyasthaṁ ced bhaved jñānaṁ kāyābhāve na sarvavit |
SA23n2988:411: ato'pi buddhakāyo hi sarvajño na vidhīyate || 41 ||
SA23n2988:414: buddhasya pratimetyevaṁ vaktuṁ yuktaṁ hi yoginā || 42 ||
SA23n2988:416: tasmāt mūḍhataro loko yo rūpaṁ dhyātumicchati |
SA23n2988:433: ākāra eva tad jñānamākārād vā tiraskṛtam |
SA23n2988:436: ākāraṁ ced na tad jñānaṁ jñānasyākāratā nahi |
SA23n2988:437: yathākāśo ghaṭo na syāt naivākāśo ghaṭo bhavet || 3 ||
SA23n2988:439: arūpaṁ na bhavet rūpaṁ [arūpī] rūpavān nahi |
SA23n2988:446: yadyākāro hi tad jñānaṁ saṁskṛtatvaṁ prasajyate || 6 ||
SA23n2988:448: asaṁskṛto bhaved bhāvo nahi loke sa vidyate |
SA23n2988:455: utpādaviratī na staḥ kathaṁ jñānaṁ [hi] tad bhavet || 9 ||
SA23n2988:460: avikāraṁ tu tad jñānaṁ sarvabuddheḥ pradarśitam |
SA23n2988:463: jñānasya pratibhāso'yaṁ na tad jñānaṁ prakalpyate |
SA23n2988:472: ākārād vyatirikte tu jñāne jñānaṁ na yujyate |
SA23n2988:473: jñeye sati bhaved jñānaṁ na tu jñeye tiraskṛte || 15 ||
SA23n2988:475: ākārebhyaḥ pṛthagbhūtaṁ jñānaṁ ced yadi kalpyate |
SA23n2988:481: yathā ghaṭasya niṣpattau na paṭasyodbhavo bhavet |
SA23n2988:487: kimapekṣya bhaved jñānaṁ sākāraṁ yena tedbhavet |
SA23n2988:491: ākāraiḥ sahitaṁ yat tu tat sākāraṁ prakalpate || 21 ||
SA23n2988:495: buddhajñānaṁ vinā buddhaḥ kathaṁ tattvaṁ bhaviṣyati || 22 ||
SA23n2988:497: na tad jñānaṁ na sarvajñaḥ pṛthagjñāne vikalpate |
SA23n2988:506: ākāreṇa ca yuktaṁ [hi] sākāratvaṁ bhaved yadi |
SA23n2988:510: saṁskṛtatvaṁ yathā jñāne sākāratvaṁ na sidhyati || 27 ||
SA23n2988:513: anyonyakaṁ mayoktaṁ ca kathaṁ jñānaṁ bhaviṣyati || 28 ||
SA23n2988:519: tathā jñānaṁ nirākāraṁ kathamevaṁ na kalpate || 30 ||
SA23n2988:529: sarvajñatvaṁ na tasyāsti na jñānatvāt ca kalpanā |
SA23n2988:533: vetti sarvantu yat satyamabhūtaṁ vettyasau katham || 4 ||
SA23n2988:536: evaṁ jānāti tad jñānamalīkaṁ vettyasau katham || 5 ||
SA23n2988:541: māyādyā ye tu dṛṣṭāntā mithyākalpena kalpitāḥ |
SA23n2988:542: na vidyante svabhāvena sa kathaṁ vetti sarvavit || 7 ||
SA23n2988:544: śaśaśṛṅgaṁ na tad vetti nāpi vandhyā sutaṁ tathā |
SA23n2988:550: (20) dṛṣṭāntaireva te tulyā dharmāścet sarvathā smṛtāḥ |
SA23n2988:565: yadi rūpādayo bhāvā vidyante naiva sarvathā |
SA23n2988:577: rūpādayo na santīti tvayaivoktaṁ punaḥ punaḥ |
SA23n2988:580: (21) yadyabhāvena yogaḥ syād yuktaṁ vaktuṁ tvayedṛśam |
SA23n2988:586: nāsau kiñcid yadā vetti sattvārthaṁ kurute katham |
SA23n2988:587: nāvedako hi sarvajño na kṛpā sattvasaṅgrahe || 22 ||
SA23n2988:624: hetunā sadṛśaṁ jñānaṁ phalaṁ loke tu yujyate |
SA23n2988:625: kodravā nahi jāyante śālayaḥ kvacideva tu || 3 ||
SA23n2988:637: nahi dharmāḥ parā vo'sti anyathā tattvagrāhiṇām || 7 ||
SA23n2988:643: padānyetāni sarvāṇi smaryante tu kathaṁ nahi || 9 ||
SA23n2988:653: madhye na kiṁcidapyasti kathaṁ tattvaṁ bhaviṣyati |
SA23n2988:656: preraṇe bhastrayā vāyoḥ tathaiva kṣepaṇe'pi ca yathā kaścit dhamed bhastrāṁ tadvaddeho dhamenmanaḥ || 3 ||
SA23n2988:671: na teṣāṁ sugatau janma gatirekaiva nārakī || 8 ||
SA23n2988:679: na tatsukhaṁ svabhāvena vidyate sarvadā yataḥ || 2 ||
SA23n2988:684: anityaṁ mahāsukhaṁ naiva sadā nityaṁ mahāsukham |
SA23n2988:699: samyak tattvaṁ yathā labhyaṁ tadidānīṁ prakathyate || 2 ||
SA23n2988:725: yat puṇyaṁ sarvabuddhānāṁ tatsutānāṁ ca dhīmatām |
SA23n2988:729: svakīyaṁ parakīyaṁ ca saṁhṛṣṭena tu cetasā || 12 ||
SA23n2988:736: bhaveyuḥ prāṇino buddhāḥ sarve yāvat pratiṣṭhitāḥ || 14 ||
SA23n2988:742: trikālaṁ tu yathāśaktyā puṣpādibhiḥ prapūjya ca || 16 ||
SA23n2988:745: kṛtvā pañcāmṛtaṁ miśraṁ amiśraṁ vā prakalpitam || 17 ||
SA23n2988:750: praṇinaśca [na] te ghātyā adattaṁ naiva cāharet |
SA23n2988:751: nācaret kāmamithyā vā mṛṣāṁ naiva hi bhāṣayet || 19 ||
SA23n2988:759: samādhyaṅgaṁ tataḥ sarvaṁ gṛhṇīyāt saṁvaraṁ param |
SA23n2988:769: bodhicittaṁ na tannāma viṣamatvaṁ yadā sthitam || 25 ||
SA23n2988:787: anyathā nahi tattvānāṁ u[da]yaṁ sarvathā bhavet || 31 ||
SA23n2988:796: eṣa mārgasthito yogī śuklapakṣe yathā śaśī |
SA23n2988:797: vṛddhikramaṁ mamāyāti kṣayaṁ na tu kadācana || 34 ||
SA23n2988:807: kathaṁ deśanayā pāpaṁ kṣayaṁ gacchet sudāruṇam |
SA23n2988:811: kvacinneti ca tantreṣu kathaṁ tanna virudhyate || 2 ||
SA23n2988:822: cittena ca vinā kāyaḥ kiñcit karttuṁ bhavet kṣamaḥ |
SA23n2988:823: vacanaṁ ca vinā tena bhavet naiva kadācana || 6 ||
SA23n2988:826: cittenaiva jagat sarvaṁ kriyate yat śubhāśubham || 7 ||
SA23n2988:831: (32) cittenaiva tu tatsarvaṁ kriyate yat śubhāśubham |
SA23n2988:840: ghaṭamutpādya yaḥ kaścit bhanattyeva tu tat svayam |
SA23n2988:841: tathā pāpaṁ samutpannaṁ nāśayet ātmanā sa tu || 12 ||
SA23n2988:844: na cāsya deśanā yuktā na pāpaṁ tasya naśyati || 13 ||
SA23n2988:847: kṛte puṇye'pi chi[dra]tvād bhavennāśaṁ na saṁśayaḥ || 14 ||
SA23n2988:849: dadataśca yadā citte dātumicchā na varttate |
SA23n2988:850: datte'pi ca na tatpuṇyaṁ prabhaviṣyati kasyacit || 15 ||
SA23n2988:870: vihāya laukikīṁ vṛttimanyathā tu bhavenna kim |
SA23n2988:882: devataiva ca tat sarvaṁ karotīti prakalpyate |
SA23n2988:883: utpādāt pūrvamevāsau kārayet na kathaṁ bhṛśam || 26 ||
SA23n2988:895: kuśalaṁ na bhavet sarvaṁ puṇyaṁ tu karuṇotthitam || 30 ||
SA23n2988:897: yat karmma parahitārthaṁ kriyate tu kṛpātmakaiḥ |
SA23n2988:906: uktaṁ ca- kalpāntādbodhisattvānāṁ śubhaṁ vā yadi vā'śubham |
SA23n2988:907: sarvaṁ kalyāṇatāmeti teṣāṁ vaśyaṁ yato manaḥ || 34 ||
SA23n2988:914: sarve'pi prāṇinaḥ sarvaṁ bhakṣanto'pi na buddhakāḥ |
SA23n2988:918: tatsrāvabhakṣakaḥ kaścit sarvaṁ bhuktaṁ na tena kim || 3 ||
SA23n2988:935: (36) śucitvaṁ asti cet kiñcit aśucitvaṁ bhaviṣyati |
SA23n2988:944: yogināṁ samanujñātaṁ aviruddhaṁ yathā tu tat || 1 ||
SA23n2988:949: mātā pitā ca putraḥ syāt putro mātā pitā bhavet |
SA23n2988:950: ceṭī bhāryyāpi tau syātāṁ bhāryyā mātā bhavatyapi || 3 ||
SA23n2988:956: mātā pitā na [bhū]to hi kaścit sattvo na vidyate || 5 ||
SA23n2988:958: duhitrādyāḥ tathā sarvāḥ prāgbhūtāḥ santi ṣaḍgatau |
SA23n2988:961: ata eva tu te nāthāḥ vajrasattvādayo varāḥ |
SA23n2988:965: vajrayānaṁ samāruhya ko vā pāraṁ gamiṣyati || 8 ||
SA23n2988:976: tadvāraṇaṁ kṛtaṁ pūrvaṁ arūpatvaṁ tataḥ sthitam || 2 ||
SA23n2988:979: abhāvo'pi na tat tattvaṁ sarvaduḥkhākaraṁ param || 3 ||
SA23n2988:981: bhāvābhāvau na tau tattvaṁ bhavet tābhyāṁ vivarjitam |
SA23n2988:982: na deśasthamato yuktaṁ sarvajño na bhavet tadā || 4 ||
SA23n2988:988: avikāryyaṁ na tasyāsti na sarvajño bhaviṣyati || 6 ||
SA23n2988:990: kramāt jānāti yaḥ kaścit sarvaṁ nāsau prabuddhyate |
SA23n2988:1002: (39) avarṇyo yo bhaveddharmmaḥ kastaṁ nāśayituṁ kṣamaḥ |
SA23n2988:1003: śastrodakaviṣāgnīnāṁ buddho jāto bhavet na tu || 11 ||
SA23n2988:1008: asārvakāliko yastu na sarvajño bhavet sa tu |
SA23n2988:1009: tasmāt sarvaprakālaṁ tu bhavitavyaṁ iti smṛtam || 13 ||
SA23n2988:1015: evaṁ cittena yaddhāvyaṁ taddhāvati na citta[kam] || 15 ||
SA23n2988:1017: cittena bhāsyate yattat tadeva tu nirīkṣyate |
SA23n2988:1018: idaṁ tat kīdṛśaṁ cittamiti cintā na varttate || 16 ||
SA23n2988:1029: pṛcchako'pi na taṁ pṛcchet [yena tattvaṁ] prabudhyate || 3 ||
SA23n2988:1035: dvāveva yadi gacchetāṁ tayorduḥkhaṁ na saṁśayaḥ || 5 ||
SA23n2988:1038: dvitīyaṁ tādṛśaṁ kaścit kathaṁ grāmaṁ praveśayet || 6 ||
SA23n2988:1064: varjanīyā[śca te ] sattvā na teṣāṁ paryyupāsanam |
SA23n2988:1065: na teṣāṁ pratighaṁ kuryyāt na te [pūjya]tarā bhavet || 15 ||
SA23n2988:1071: śiṣyasya lakṣaṇaṁ caivaṁ kathyate sa yathā bhavet || 17 ||
SA23n2988:1078: tadvad gurau triratne ca bodhicitte ca bhaktimān |
SA23n2988:1079: karuṇā ca tathā loke nauriyaṁ saṁprakīrttitā | 2 ||
SA23n2988:1081: guruḥ karṇadharo vidvān naukā dharmmaḥ prakāśitaḥ |
SA23n2988:1084: karṇadhāraṁ vinā naukā pāraṁ prāptuṁ kṣamā nahi |
SA23n2988:1103: śiṣyo ca bhavituṁ śakto buddhairevaṁ pradarśyate || 10 ||
SA23n2988:1105: mṛtpiṇḍo hi yathā bālaiḥ kṣipyate yatra tatra vai |
SA23n2988:1120: kaścit mṛdvindriyaḥ karma kevalaṁ vakti nānyathā || 4 ||
SA23n2988:1122: śrīsamājottare deśitam- anādinidhanaṁ śāntaṁ bhāvābhāvākṣayaṁ vibhum |
SA23n2988:1126: anena vyāpitvaṁ avikāritvaṁ sārvakālikatvaṁ ca kathitam |
SA23n2988:1128: arū- pitve'pi deśastho yadi syāt vināśyeva bhavati |
SA23n2988:1129: yathā kastūrīkādīnāṁ sugandhaṁ arūpyapi deśasthatvāt kastūrī- (45)
SA23n2988:1130: kādīnāṁ tadvāsitadravyasya vā'bhāve vināśi syādvikāri ca |
SA23n2988:1135: sarvadharmmaniḥsvabhāvatayā sarvatathāgata- jñānaparijñānaṁ śunyatā [tayā] karuṇayā vā abhinnamekī- bhūtaṁ yat cittam |
SA23n2988:1136: karuṇā nāma sarvasattvān asminneva jñānarāje pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi,
SA23n2988:1139: saha anyonyavyāpakabhāvena sadā sthito buddhakṛtyakaraḥ sarvasattveṣu mahākaruṇāpramāṇānugataṁ bodhicittaṁ vajra ityarthaḥ |
SA23n2988:1142: ādikarmmikādīnāṁ tu bodhicittaṁ sarvasattvānanuttarāyāṁ samyaksambodhau pratiṣṭhāpayāmīti cittamātram |
SA23n2988:1143: punastatraiva deśitam- samājaṁ mīlanaṁ proktaṁ sarvabuddhābhidhānakam || 6 ||
SA23n2988:1146: teṣāṁ mīlanaṁ sarvatathāgatajñānavajradharatvameva nirddiṣṭamanyathā rūpakāyena yadi mīlanaṁ syāt paramāṇu- pramāṇādi sarvatathāgatānāṁ mīlane ākāśamapi (46)
SA23n2988:1149: punastatraiva tathā utpannakramāṇāṁ akṣataṁ samyag jñānam |
SA23n2988:1150: evaṁ ca tatraiva prakāśitam- dhyāyanti ye'muṁ suviśuddhamanādibhāvamityādi |
SA23n2988:1152: punaḥ- anutpanneṣu dharmmeṣu na bhāvo na ca bhāvanā |
SA23n2988:1159: tadyathā- api nāma kulaputrā ākāśaḥ sarvatrānugataḥ |
SA23n2988:1161: tāni na kāmadhātu- sthitāni nārupadhātusthitāni na caturmmahābhūtasthitāni |
SA23n2988:1163: imamarthaṁ ca maṁvijñāya tathāgatāḥ sarvasattvānāṁ cāśrayaṁ vijñāpayanta evaṁ dharmmaṁ deśayanti |
SA23n2988:1164: evameva kulaputrā ākāśavada- niruktāste tathāgatasamayā anugantavyāḥ |
SA23n2988:1166: nāma kulaputrāḥ kāṇḍaṁ ca mathanīyaṁ ca puruṣahastavyāyā- ma[ñca] pratītya dhūmaḥ prādurbhavati agnimabhinirvarttayati |
SA23n2988:1167: sa cāgnirna kāṇḍe sthito na mathanīyasthito na puruṣahasta- vyāyāmasthitaḥ |
SA23n2988:1175: ṣoḍaśe paṭale- pātanaṁ vajrasūtrasya rajaso'pi nipātanam |
SA23n2988:1176: na kāryyaṁ mantratattvena kārayet nāpi durllabhāḥ || 11 ||
SA23n2988:1179: mantra- tattveneti manaḥsantrāṇabhūtatvāt mantrajñānaṁ samyagjñānaṁ nidarśitaṁ ityarthaḥ |
SA23n2988:1180: yadyevaṁ mohāt karoti cet bodhi- rduṣkaro bhavatīti |
SA23n2988:1181: maṇḍalenādikarmmikasattvakṛpākaruṇā- buddhatvaṁ vajradha[ratvaṁ] ca durlabhaṁ bhavatītyarthaḥ |
SA23n2988:1182: tasmāt samyag- jñānābhiyuktena mahāyoginā maṇḍalalikhanapraveśābhi- ṣekādikaṁ niṣiddhaṁ iti |
SA23n2988:1225: jñānajñeyaṁ vinā na syāt samāpattirataḥ smṛtā |
SA23n2988:1238: ṣaḍbhujaṁ kathyate tena jñānaṁ bauddhaṁ tathāgataiḥ || 30 ||
SA23n2988:1240: bodhicittaṁ bhaved vajraṁ prajñā ghaṇṭā vidhīyate |
SA23n2988:1252: evam mayā śrutamekasmin samaye bhagavān sarvatathāgata- kāyavākcittahṛdayavajrayoṣidbhageṣu vijahāra ekasminneva kāle |
SA23n2988:1257: etaduktaṁ bhavati- sarvatathāgatajñāneṣu anyonyavyāpya- vyāpakabhūteṣu yogino jñānaṁ tadantargatameva sarvathaiva sthita- mini tattvaṁ sarvajñāneṣu krameṇa sthitamityarthaḥ |
SA23n2988:1260: uktaṁ ca tattvasaṁgrahe tantrarāje- sarvatathāgatamahābodhi- dṛḍhasattva ityārabhya anādinidhanaḥ śānto bhagavān mahā- bodhisattvavajraḥ samantabhadro mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgata- hṛdayeṣu vijahāra |
SA23n2988:1261: (51) atha sarvatathāgatāḥ prāhuḥ- kathaṁ tvaṁ kulaputrānuttarāṁ samyaksambodhimabhisaṁbhotsyase yastvaṁ sarvatathāgatatattvānyabhi- jñāya iṣṭatarāṇyupahasasīti ||
SA23n2988:1262: sarvārthasiddhibodhisattva āha- bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ ājñāpa[yatha] kathaṁ pratipadyāmīdṛśaṁ tattvamiti |
SA23n2988:1263: tathāgatā āhuḥ- pratipadyasva kulaputra svacittapratyave- kṣaṇasamādhānena prakṛtisiddhena rucijaptena mantreṇeti oṁ cittaprativedhaṁ karomīti |
SA23n2988:1265: ā jñāto bhagavantaḥ sarvatathā- ga[tā]ḥ svahṛdi candramaṇḍalākāraṁ paśyāmi |
SA23n2988:1270: yathākramācca- [ndra]maṇḍalaṁ sampūrṇaṁ bhavati tadvat prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṁ citta- ratnamapi paripūrṇaṁ bhavati |
SA23n2988:1271: yathā candramaṇḍalamāgantuka- kalābhiḥ sūryyamaṇḍa[la]raśamyapagamāt kramāt pūrṇaṁ dṛśyate tadvat prakṛtipariśuddhaṁ cittaratnamapi sarvakleśamalakalaṅkāpa- gamakramāt paripūrṇabuddhaguṇaṁ dṛśyate iti |
SA23n2988:1273: punarnavamapaṭale- svacchaṁ hi sarvasattvānāṁ cittaṁ śāntaṁ prabhāsvaram |
SA23n2988:1279: punaśca trayodaśe paṭale- maṇḍalaṁ sarvabuddhānāṁ tattvajñānācca maṇḍalam |
SA23n2988:1286: punastatraiva- sa caiva sarvabhāvena sarvadā samavasthitaḥ |
SA23n2988:1292: mahāsamayatantre'pi nirddiṣṭam- ahaṁ ca kāmarūpāgraḥ sarvabuddhairadhiṣṭhitaḥ |
SA23n2988:1299: tasya tattvam- anādinidhanaḥ sattvo vajrasattvo mahārataḥ |
SA23n2988:1312: na bodhirnāpi buddhatvaṁ na sattvo nāpi jīvitā | 47 ||
SA23n2988:1314: śrīvajramaṇḍalālaṅkāre nigaditam- sarvatra sarvadhātau tu sarvasattvā[śca] sarvataḥ |
SA23n2988:1324: sarvendriyaṁ ca vijñānaṁ cittaṁ sarvatra sarvataḥ || 51 ||
SA23n2988:1333: tileṣu va yathā tailaṁ rasa ikṣoḥ prakalpitaḥ || 54 ||
SA23n2988:1335: puṣpeṣu vā yathā gandho dadhni navanītaṁ yathā |
SA23n2988:1340: sambaratantre nigaditam- na yogaḥ pratibimbeṣu niṣiktādiṣu jāyate |
SA23n2988:1358: sarvatra sarvataḥ sarvaṁ sarvathā sarvadā svayam |
SA23n2988:1370: punaḥ- anādinidhanaḥ sattvo vajrasattvaḥ paraṁ yataḥ |
SA23n2988:1392: na tasyopadravaṁ kiñcit sadā sarvatra vidyate || 5 ||
SA23n2988:1398: rakṣā kṛtā tathā naiva yathaiva jñānabhāvinaḥ || 7 ||
SA23n2988:1409: (58) jñātayaḥ sarvasattvā vai na paro'styatra ṣaḍgatau |
SA23n2988:1412: sthāne deśe gṛhe vā'tha pustake pratimāsu ca |
SA23n2988:1438: guruṇāpi hi dṛṣṭena guṇapūrṇā janā yadi |
SA23n2988:1444: (60) tato dināvadhiṁ kṛtvā śiṣyāya vacanaṁ vadet |
SA23n2988:1447: manasā bhavato vaśyaṁ kuru cittamato dṛḍham |
SA23n2988:1448: duṣpūraṇaṁ yato na syāttathā kāryyaṁ mahāmate || 11 ||
SA23n2988:1500: puṇyahīnāḥ parāṁ bodhiṁ naiva prāpsyanti durnayāḥ |
SA23n2988:1501: itastataśca saṁsāre te bhramanti hi ṣaḍgatau || 28 ||
SA23n2988:1506: na teṣāṁ sugatau janma buddhatvaṁ api durlabham |
SA23n2988:1513: saṁśayaṁ nahi dharmme tu karttavyamadhunā tvayā || 32 ||
SA23n2988:1517: abhiṣekaṁ tvayā prāptaṁ vidyate na [hyataḥ] param || 33 ||
SA23n2988:1519: sarvatāthāgatajñānavarābhiṣiktasya yoginaḥ māhātmyaṁ śrīsamāje nirddiṣṭam- tadyathā sarvatathāgatakāyavāk- cittavajraguhyasamabhiṣikto bhagavantaḥ ācāryyāḥ sarvatathā- gataiḥ sarvabodhisattvaiśca kathaṁ draṣṭavyaḥ?
SA23n2988:1520: sarvatathāgatāḥ prāhuḥ- bodhicittaṁ vajraṁ iva kulaputrāḥ sarvatathāgataiḥ sarvabodhisattvaiśca draṣṭavyam |
SA23n2988:1522: bodhicittavajraścācāryyo dvayameva tadadhikāraṁ yāvat kulaputrāḥ saṁkṣepataḥ kathayāmi |
SA23n2988:1523: yāvanto daśadiglokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bodhisattvāśca tiṣṭhanti prayanti ca sarve te trikāla- samayamāgatya tamācāryyaṁ sarvatathāgatapūjābhiḥ saṁpūjya sarva- (63)
SA23n2988:1527: tadyathā- api nāma kulaputrā yāvanto buddhā bhagavanto daśasu dikṣu pracaranti teṣāṁ ca buddhānāṁ bhagavatāṁ yāvantaḥ kāyavākcittapuṇyaskandhā ācāryyasya romakūpāgravivare viśiṣyate |
SA23n2988:1529: bodhicittaṁ kulaputrāḥ sarvabuddhajñānānāṁ sārabhūta- mutpattibhūtaṁ yāvat sarvajñajñānākaramiti |
SA23n2988:1532: mahājñānaprabhavitamahāyogīśvarasya prabhāvaṁ kalpakoṭi- śatenāpi sarvatathāgatairapi na śakyaṁ varṇayitum |
SA23n2988:1533: śrīsambaroktaṁ kiñcinmātraṁ kathyate- sarvatra sarvataḥ sarvaṁ sarvathā sarvadā svayam |
SA23n2988:1557: ityāha bhagavān śrīvajrasattvaḥ- sarvaśuddhyadhimokṣeṇa prasahya balavānadhaḥ |
SA23n2988:1598: avasāne tu karttavyaṁ sarvabuddhāḥ sa aurasāḥ |
SA23n2988:1619: yadi cittaṁ samaṁ yasya jñānaṁ tasyodayaṁ bhavet |
SA23n2988:1628: tattvaṁ vinā na buddhatvaṁ tattvaṁ mārgaṁ vinā na [ca] |
SA23n2988:1638: vajrajñānavaro yogo yeṣāṁ naiva hi vidyate |
